data.title: Replace Lost Registration, License Plate, or Decals
data.meta_description: You may obtain a copy of your registration at any of our locations. Office Hours and Locations You will be asked to provide the...
data.text:
You may obtain a copy of your registration at any of our locations.

Office Hours and Locations

You will be asked to provide the following:

Government issued ID

License plate number

$3.00 duplicate registration fee

include an additional $2.00 if mailed.

Lost or stolen?

Lost: If your decal or plate has been misplaced or lost, you may obtain a replacement at any of our locations.

Stolen: If your decal or plate has been stolen, we recommend filing a police report by dialing 615-862-8600.
